d = pd.read_csv('../data/radiopaedia_cases.csv')
dls = ImageDataLoaders3D.from_df(d,
                                 label_col = 2, # in sample data 0: series, 1: segmentation mask, 2: random binary label
                                 item_tfms = ResizeCrop3D(crop_by = (0., 0.1, 0.1), resize_to = (20, 150, 150), perc_crop = True),
                                 bs = 2, 
                                 val_bs = 2
                                 )
{% endraw %}

CNN learner

The fastai cnn_learner class can be used to construct a 3D CNN with only a few modifactions to the original functions. See the faimed3d.layers notebook for details.

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

cnn_learner_3d[source]

cnn_learner_3d(dls, arch, loss_func=None, pretrained=True, cut=None, splitter=None, y_range=None, config=None, n_out=None, normalize=True, opt_func='Adam', lr=0.001, cbs=None, metrics=None, path=None, model_dir='models', wd=None, wd_bn_bias=False, train_bn=True, moms=(0.95, 0.85, 0.95))

Build a convnet style learner from dls and arch Same as fastai func but adds the AddColorChannel callback.

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
from torchvision.models.video import r3d_18
learn = cnn_learner_3d(dls, r3d_18, pretrained=False) # pretrained turned off for more speed while testing, default would be to load a pretrained model

unet_learner_3d[source]

unet_learner_3d(dls, arch, normalize=True, n_out=None, pretrained=True, config=None, loss_func=None, opt_func='Adam', lr=0.001, splitter=None, cbs=None, metrics=None, path=None, model_dir='models', wd=None, wd_bn_bias=False, train_bn=True, moms=(0.95, 0.85, 0.95), norm_type=NormType.Batch, **kwargs)

Build a unet learner from dls and arch

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
dls = SegmentationDataLoaders3D.from_df(d,  
                                codes = ['no covid', 'covid'],
                                 item_tfms = ResizeCrop3D(crop_by = (0., 0.1, 0.1), resize_to = (20, 100, 100), perc_crop = True), 
                                 bs = 2, val_bs = 2)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
learn = unet_learner_3d(dls, r3d_18, pretrained=False)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
learn.fit_one_cycle(1, 0.001)
epoch train_loss valid_loss time
0 0.597306 0.645879 00:07
